org.jamsim.ascape.ui

Class JEditPanelView

  • java.lang.Object
    • PanelViewNoStall
      • org.jamsim.ascape.ui.JEditPanelView

  • public class JEditPanelView
extends PanelViewNoStall
    A org.ascape.view.vis.PanelView that contains a JEdit TextArea.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_MODE
      Default mode for buffer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JEditPanelView()
      Create a untitled blank JEditPanelView using the default mode ( DEFAULT_MODE).

      Create JEditPanelView with specified title and underlying file.
      JEditPanelView(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String modeExt)
      Create a blank JEditPanelView with specified title and mode.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_MODE

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_MODE
        Default mode for buffer. Used when a mode is not specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • JEditPanelView

        public JEditPanelView()
        Create a untitled blank JEditPanelView using the default mode ( DEFAULT_MODE).

      • JEditPanelView

        public JEditPanelView(java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String modeExt)
        Create a blank JEditPanelView with specified title and mode.
        Parameters:
        title - frame title
        modeExt - filename eg: "d:\readme.txt", or file extension eg: ".txt", used to look up the mode. If a mode cannot be found, then DEFAULT_MODE is used.

      • JEditPanelView

        public JEditPanelView(java.lang.String title,
              java.io.File file)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Create JEditPanelView with specified title and underlying file.
        Parameters:
        title - frame title
        file - file contents of the JEdit TextArea, or null to create an empty TextArea. Mode is determined from the file extension.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problem reading file.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display()
        Create a frame and display this JEditPanelView.

      • isLifeOfScape

        public boolean isLifeOfScape()
        Make this an environmentView. This means it persists (ie: not disposed) after the scape closes. NB: You also need to make sure we are not removed as a listener from the scape when it closes (see #scapeNotification(org.ascape.model.event.ScapeEvent)).
        Returns:
        false

      • canQuit

        public boolean canQuit()

      • isNewUnsavedFile

        public boolean isNewUnsavedFile()
        Is this is a new file that hasn't been saved.
        Returns:
        true if new unsaved file

        public void setFile(java.io.File file)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Set buffer save file and change panel title.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problem reading file name

        public void setPanelViewListener(PanelViewListener pvl)
        Set the PanelViewListener.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getCurrentSelection

        public java.lang.String getCurrentSelection()
        Get currently highlighted buffer selection.
        Returns:
        current selection of null if nothing selected.

      • isDirty

        public boolean isDirty()
        Return the modified status of the buffer.
        Returns:

                throws java.io.IOException
        Save the buffer to its file (if the buffer is dirty).
        Throws:
